title: BRIEF-Cott Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.12
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:17 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Cott Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.12 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Cott Corp: * COTT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND DECLARES DIVIDEND * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 * COTT SEES FY 2018 REVENUE IN EXCESS OF $2.3 BILLION * COTT IS TARGETING FULL YEAR 2018 REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS IN EXCESS OF $2.3 BILLION‍​ * QTRLY ‍REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS INCREASED ABOUT 10% TO $571 MILLION​ * TARGETING FULL YEAR 2018 CASH FLOW PROVIDED BY OPERATIONS OF APPROXIMATELY $230 TO $235 MILLION AND CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $115 TO $120 MILLION * TARGETING FULL YEAR 2019 CASH FLOW PROVIDED BY OPERATIONS OF APPROXIMATELY $265 TO $270 MILLION AND CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $115 TO $120 MILLION * SEES 2019 ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW OF APPROXIMATELY $150 MILLION (WHEN EXCLUDING ACQUISITION, INTEGRATION AND OTHER CASH COSTS)‍​ * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $2.50 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
